import React, { useEffect, useReducer } from 'react'; import EditDeliveryAddress from './EditDeliveryAddress'; function DeliveryAddress({ address }) { const [form, toggleForm] = useReducer((form) => !form, false); return (
{form ? ( ) : (
Primary
{address?.[0] ? address[0].line1 : 'In order to expedite the checkout process please set up the primary delivery address'}
{' '}
Secondary
{address.length > 1 ? address[1] : 'No secondary address provided'}
)}
); } export default DeliveryAddress;
